channel.title: Data Vision
channel.description: My personal blog for studying; mainly related to data

item.title: 백준 Silver3 - 1, 2, 3 더하기
item.description:
백준 9095번

풀이

t = int(input())


def solution(n):
    if n == 1:
        return 1
    elif n == 2:
        return 2
    elif n == 3:
        return 4
    else:
        a, b, c = 1, 2, 4
        for _ in range(4, n+1):
            a, b, c = b, c, a+b+c
        return c


res = []
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    r = solution(n)
    res.append(r)

print(*res, sep='\n')

item.title: 백준 Silver3 - 01 타일
item.description:
백준 1904번

풀이

n = int(input())

if n == 1:
    print(1)
elif n == 2:
    print(2)
else:
    d = 15746
    a, b = 1, 2
    for i in range(3, n+1):
        a, b = b % d, (a+b) % d
    print(b)

item.title: 백준 Silver3 - 피보나치 수 7
item.description:
백준 15624번

풀이

n = int(input())
d = 1000000007

if n == 0:
    print(0)
elif n == 1:
    print(1)
else:
    a, b = 0, 1
    for i in range(2, n+1):
        a, b = b % d, (a+b) % d
    print(b % d)

item.title: 백준 Silver3 - 2xN 타일링
item.description:
백준 11726번

풀이

n = int(input())

if n == 1:
    print(1)
elif n == 2:
    print(2)
else:
    d = 10007
    a, b = 1, 2
    for _ in range(3, n+1):
        a, b = b % d, (a+b) % d
    print(b)

item.title: 백준 Silver2 - 가장 긴 증가하는 부분 수열
item.description:
백준 11053번

풀이

n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))

d = [0] * n
for i in range(n):
    d[i] = 1
    for j in range(i):
        if arr[i] > arr[j]:
            d[i] = max(d[i], d[j]+1)

print(max(d))

앞에서 계산된 결괏값들의 최댓값을 취한다.

item.title: 백준 Gold4 - 세 용액
item.description:
백준 2473번

풀이

n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
arr.sort()

arr_minus = [x for x in arr if x <= 0]
# res1: + + +
if len(arr_minus) >= 3:
    res1 = abs(arr_minus[-3]+arr_minus[-2]+arr_minus[-1])
else:
    res1 = int(1e10)
arr_plus = [x for x in arr if x >= 0]
# res2: - - -
if len(arr_plus) >= 3:
    res2 = abs(arr_plus[0]+arr_plus[1]+arr_plus[2])
else:
    res2 = int(1e10)

# res3: - - +
res3 = int(1e10)
arr_minus = []
arr_plus = [x for x in arr if x > 0]
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        if arr[i] <= 0 and arr[j] <= 0:
            arr_minus.append(arr[i]+arr[j])
arr_minus.sort()
i, j = 0, len(arr_plus)-1
while i < len(arr_minus) and j >= 0:
    tmp = arr_minus[i]+arr_plus[j]
    if abs(tmp) < res3:
        res3 = abs(tmp)
        a, b = arr_minus[i], arr_plus[j]
    if tmp > 0:
        j -= 1
    else:
        i += 1

# res4: + + -
res4 = int(1e10)
arr_minus = [x for x in arr if x < 0]
arr_plus = []
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        if arr[i] >= 0 and arr[j] >= 0:
            arr_plus.append(arr[i]+arr[j])
arr_plus.sort()
i, j = 0, len(arr_plus)-1
while i < len(arr_minus) and j >= 0:
    tmp = arr_minus[i]+arr_plus[j]
    if abs(tmp) < res4:
        res4 = abs(tmp)
        x, y = arr_minus[i], arr_plus[j]
    if tmp > 0:
        j -= 1
    else:
        i += 1

min_val = min([res1, res2, res3, res4])
if min_val == res1:
    arr_minus = [x for x in arr if x <= 0]
    print(arr_minus[-3], arr_minus[-2], arr_minus[-1])
elif min_val == res2:
    arr_plus = [x for x in arr if x >= 0]
    print(arr_plus[0], arr_plus[1], arr_plus[2])
elif min_val == res3:
    done = False
    idx1 = idx2 = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if not done and arr[i] <= 0 and arr[j] <= 0 and arr[i]+arr[j] == a:
                done = True
                idx1, idx2 = i, j
                break
    print(arr[idx1], arr[idx2], b)
else:
    done = False
    idx1 = idx2 = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if not done and arr[i] >= 0 and arr[j] >= 0 and arr[i]+arr[j] == y:
                done = True
                idx1, idx2 = i, j
                break
    print(x, arr[idx1], arr[idx2])

케이스를 4개로 나누어서 풀었다. 코드가 엄청 길어짐..

item.title: 백준 Gold3 - 소수의 연속합
item.description:
백준 1644번

풀이

n = int(input())
is_prime = [True for _ in range(n+1)]
is_prime[1] = False
i = 2
while i*i <= n:
    if is_prime[i]:
        j = 2
        while i*j <= n:
            is_prime[i*j] = False
            j += 1
    i += 1

nums = [i for i in range(1, n+1) if is_prime[i]]
m = len(nums)
cnt = 0
total = 0
i = j = 0
while i < m:
    while j < m and total < n:
        total += nums[j]
        j += 1
    if total == n:
        cnt += 1
    total -= nums[i]
    i += 1

print(cnt)

에라토스테네스의 체 알고리즘 + 투 포인터를 적용하면 풀 수 있는 문제.

item.title: 프로그래머스 Lv3 - 보석 쇼핑
item.description:
프로그래머스 67258번

풀이

def solution(gems):
    n = len(gems)
    m = len(set(gems))
    i = j = 0
    s = {}
    cnt = 0
    answer = [1, n]
    min_diff = n-1
    while i < n:
        while j < n and cnt < m:
            if gems[j] in s:
                s[gems[j]] += 1
            else:
                cnt += 1
                s[gems[j]] = 1
            j += 1
        if (j-(i+1)) < min_diff and cnt == m:
            answer = [i+1, j]
            min_diff = j-(i+1)
        if s[gems[i]] == 1:
            cnt -= 1
            del s[gems[i]]
        else:
            s[gems[i]] -= 1
        i += 1
    return answer

item.title: 백준 Silver1 - 회전 초밥
item.description:
백준 2531번

풀이

from collections import deque

n, d, k, c = map(int, input().split())
arr = []
for _ in range(n):
    arr.append(int(input()))

i = j = 0
s = deque()
res = 0
while i < n:
    if len(s) == 0:
        for _ in range(k):
            s.append(arr[j % n])
            j += 1
    else:
        s.append(arr[j % n])
        j += 1
    s_ = set(s)
    if c in s_:
        res = max(res, len(s_))
    else:
        res = max(res, len(s_)+1)
    s.popleft()
    i += 1

print(res)

위의 방법으로 풀면 $O(KN)$으로 풀 수 있다.

item.title: 백준 Gold4 - 부분합
item.description:
백준 1806번

풀이

n, s = map(int, input().split())
INF = int(1e9)
res = INF

arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
i = j = 0
total = 0
while i < n:
    cnt = j-i
    while j < n and total < s:
        total += arr[j]
        j += 1
        cnt += 1
    if total >= s:
        res = min(res, cnt)
        total -= arr[i]
        i += 1
    else:
        break

if res == INF:
    print(0)
else:
    print(res)
